Reviews.Title: good phone
Reviews.Author: Derek S Walker
Reviews.Content: there was somethings on the texting keys that took some getting use to. but over all a very nice phone !

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: JOHN REDDY
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone for my dad coz of the fact it was unlocked and could be used on four different network bands. It was brand new as advertised and came nicely wrapped up.

ProductInfo.Features:
V3i offers updated and streamlined Motorola RAZR V3 design for everything you loved about the RAZR and more
GSM 850 / GSM 900 / GSM 1800 / GSM 1900
1.23 megapixel digital camera with 8x digital zoom, video capture and full screen viewfinder / Up to 1280x960 still image
Motorola's Digital Audio Music Player when used with optional mini-USB stereo headset
Plays MP3 / MPEG4 files
ProductInfo.Name: Motorola V3I RAZR Cellular Phone ( Unlocked ) - Silver
